content.raw:
The [`ign-cmake` PR for `ign-transport`](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/pull-requests/239/use-ign-cmake/diff) is almost ready to merge (but we should for a new release of `ign-cmake` first). If anyone wants to give that PR one last review, now would be a good time.

Once we've released a new `ign-cmake`, we can merge that branch, and then merge its changes back to this branch, and then CI should work again for this branch.
content.html:
The ign-cmake PR for ign-transport is almost ready to merge (but we should for a new release of ign-cmake first). If anyone wants to give that PR one last review, now would be a good time.

Once we've released a new ign-cmake, we can merge that branch, and then merge its changes back to this branch, and then CI should work again for this branch.
